Dark Voyage Saturday, June 9, at 8 
      p.m. ET/PT
Ashley Barnett was an aspiring 
      actress, with dreams of making it big in Hollywood. But her 
      life was cut short at age 24, when she mysteriously died one day into a 
      pleasure cruise with her boyfriend.
 
The FBI is investigating and 
      Ashley's mom is determined to find out how and why she lost her 
      daughter.
 
Correspondent Bill 
      Lagattuta reports for the 48 Hours 
      Mystery, Saturday, June 9, at a special 
      time, 8 p.m. ET/PT.
 
Watch
Lagattuta's 
      reporter's notebook.
